mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, NAME, CONTENT, REGDATE, PARENT_SEQ FROM FREE_COMMENTS ORDER BY PARENT_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_COMMENTS (SEQ, ID, NAME, CONTENT, REGDATE, PARENT_SEQ) VALUES(FREE_COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(PARENT_SEQ),0)+1 FROM FREE_COMMENTS))
